summary: This document is a wire transfer authorization letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services. It authorizes the transfer of $2,500,000 from Maxwell's UBS account to a specified Citizens Bank account.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is authorizing a wire transfer from her UBS account.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is the recipient of the wire transfer authorization from Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is a client of Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services.

events.title: Wire Transfer Authorization
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell authorizes a wire transfer of $2,500,000 from her UBS account.

locations: 299 Park Avenue, 25th Floor, New York, NY 10171
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell authorized a wire transfer of $2,500,000.
The transfer was to be made from her UBS account.
Scott Stackman is identified as her financial advisor at UBS.
